Pre-Game Insights: Rayners is looking to score one or two goals and impress for Bafana against Algeria
Coach Hugo Broos has said that Rayners will start against Algeria
Rayners has been scoring well for Stellenbosch FC, with 7 goals in 17 DStv Premiership games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bafana Bafana will face Algeria in a tightly contested international friendly
The match will be played in Algiers on Tuesday night at the 40,000-seat Stade Nelson Mandela
Rayners will be trying to take his performance up a notch and audition for a place in the Bafana squad for June's World Cup qualifiers
Others: Khanyisa Mayo, a local-based striker, has struggled to make an impression for Bafana
Orlando Pirates' Evidence Makgopa is a PSL-based striker who has managed to make an impression under Coach Hugo Broos
